nodes.text: The Styx system was located in the Outer Rim Territories' Baxel sector. In his youth on the planet Tatooine, the Human farmboy Luke Skywalker dreamed of battling slavers in the Styx system. In one such daydream, one of the slavers that Skywalker imagined battling recalled the latter's stopping them in the Styx system.

The Styx system was first mentioned in a dream in the seventeenth issue of the Star Wars comic series, which was written by Archie Goodwin and Chris Claremont and published on November 1, 1978. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it in grid square U-11.
